description: This file defines a UI component named 'Pagination' using the LightningJS framework. It renders pagination controls and display texts, and manages user interactions to change pages, utilizing a store for state management.

classes.name: Pagination
classes.description: A LightningJS component that displays pagination info and allows page navigation.

methods.name: page
methods.description: Returns the current page number from the store state.

methods.name: pageSize
methods.description: Returns the current page size from the store state.

methods.name: total
methods.description: Returns the total number of items from the store state.

methods.name: totalPages
methods.description: Calculates and returns the total number of pages.
